features: 【Fitness Tracker With Multiple Sport Modes】This smart watch offers multiple sports modes, including walking, running, basketball, cycling, skipping, yoga, fitness, and football, among others. Smart watches for men accurately tracks your calorie consumption, steps, and workout records, providing you with real-time statistical data, making it easy for you to monitor and achieve your fitness goals. With this smartwatch, you can stay on top of your physical health and exercise routine.

【5ATM Waterproof & Long-Lasting Battery】The smart watch for men women is waterproof with an IP68 rating, allowing you to wear it during outdoor activities, including rainy weather or swimming. The waterproof watches for men come with a 280mAh battery that has a low power consumption design, providing a longer battery life of up to 7-10 days on average, with a standby time of over 30 days. The waterproof watch also features a magnetic charging cable that makes it more convenient to use.

【Smart Watch With Message Notification】This smart watches for men is compatible with most iOS 9.0 and Android 4.4 or higher smartphones, offers over 100 personalized dial wallpapers to choose from, supports message reminders and App notifications (Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, etc.), All notifications are displayed on your wrist and reminded by vibration, allowing you to stay updated on important information even while out for a walk or exercising.

【Monitor Your Health Around The Clock】This smart watch for android phones helps us to understand our health better by detecting and tracking our sleep quality, including deep and light sleep and awake time. By syncing with the app on your phone, it gives a detailed analysis of your sleep patterns. Moreover, smart watch for iphone compatible also keeps track of our stress levels, making it easier for us to adjust our lifestyles and achieve better health.

【Multi -Function Smart Watch】The watch for men offers various practical functions for daily use. Its features include an alarm clock, stopwatch, timer, music control, weather forecast, sedentary reminder, find phone, camera control, and more. Android smartwatch also has adjustable brightness and customizable watch faces. The lightweight design and soft, changeable band make it comfortable to wear. The smartwatch providing a more intelligent and efficient experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OTOSAGOW Smart Watches for Men- Your Personal Fitness Assistant Enjoy the latest technology in style with our sleek and modern design, the smart watch perfect for men. Our smartwatch is compatible with Android and iPhone devices and offers a range of features, smart watches for men including fitness and activity tracking. This Smartwatch fitness watch Will Be Your Best Personal Fitness Assistant.

Comprehensive Care for Your Health This mens watches comes with a variety of health monitoring features that help you regain control of your health. It's perfect for anyone keeping a close eye on their well-being. Fitness tracker watch With its Sleep Tracker function, wearing the watch while sleeping at night will monitor your sleep status and provide a detailed analysis of your sleep quality, including deep sleep, light sleep, and waking periods. Using the accompanying APP, you can view your recorded sleep data to adjust your daily routine and improve your sleep quality.

Smart Notification - Enjoy Ultimate Convenience With Our Smart Notification Feature Stay up-to-date with important alerts and messages without having to take out your phone. Our smart watches allow you to receive notifications, making them the perfect companion for your on-the-go lifestyle, so you can stay connected with loved ones and never miss an important message.

Achieve Your Fitness Goals 20 Sport Modes: With 20 sports modes and a health monitor, The activity trackers and smartwatches is the perfect tool to help you achieve your fitness goals. Whatever your fitness level or workout preference, from walking to running, basketball to badminton, our watch has got you covered. Activity Tracker: You'll be able to accurately track your daily activities like steps, distance, calories burned, heart rate, and more, all in real-time. Use the data analysis to get a better understanding of your workouts and to help you achieve better exercise results. Enjoy a healthy, active lifestyle with our fitness watch!

1.8 " HD IPS Colorful Full Touch Screen With Custom Watch Face Get creative and customize your own watch face with this activity tracker and smartwatch. You can choose your favorite style from 100+ dials, and even upload your favorite pictures, such as family photos, pets, or idols, you can express your unique individuality and creativity. Perfect for those who love to DIY and personalize their android smartwatch.

280mAh Low Power Large Capacity Battery This smartwatch is perfect for both men and women, and it's waterproof with an IP68 rating. You can wear it during outdoor activities such as swimming, or even on rainy days. The waterproof watch comes equipped with a 280mAh battery, which has a low power consumption design to provide a maximum battery life of up to 7–10 days on average. Plus, it has a standby time of over 30 days. The smartwatch also features a built-in magnetic charging cable, making it more convenient to use.

Enjoy a Colorful and Intelligent Life Equipped with a myriad of helpful features, The smart watch for men women serves as your personal smart assistant. Drink Reminder & Sedentary Reminder: Stay hydrated and active with the Drink & Sedentary Reminders, perfect for busy professionals and fitness enthusiasts. Weather Forecast: Get real-time weather updates by connecting your smartwatch to your mobile phone. Shake for Photograph: Access the "FitCloudPro" App > Device > Shake for Photograph > Allow camera access > Capture beautiful moments by shaking your smartwatch. Bluetooth Music Control: Switch tracks and adjust volume without accessing your phone, ideal for workouts and commutes. Find Phone: Misplaced your phone? Simply tap the "Find Phone" function on your smartwatch, and it will ring and vibrate. Brightness Adjustment: Customize your watch display with 5 brightness levels, perfect for varying environments and sensitive eyes. Alarm Clock: Wake up to a silent vibration alert by setting it on the "FitCloudPro" app - no disturbance to your loved ones.
